channel.title: How do i kick and make myself admin?
channel.description: please can u tell me how to kick someone and make my self admin or make commands

item.title: How do i kick and make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @wetodded wetodded
item.description:
@wetodded wrote:

To make yourself an admin on the server go to Characters files.
And search for your name.

Where you see

character-rights = 0

Change it to

character-rights = 2

If you want owner change it to

character-rights = 3

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2008, 01:52:59 AM[/size][hr]Here is a kick command

Add this into Client.Java where the commands are. If you dont know where they are search for barrows. Look for the } at the end of the command. Click to the right and press enter and paste this

if (command.startsWith("kick")) { PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5); sendMessage("You kicked "+command.substring(5)); System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is kicking "+command.substring(5));; }

Read full topic
item.source: How do i kick and make myself admin?
